text: Alfred Mayer (5 March 1936 â€“ 1 March 2022) was an Austrian politician. He was a member of the Austrian People's Party. He was a Landesrat of Vorarlberg from 1974 to 1993. Mayer was born in Bregenz, Vorarlberg, Austria. Mayer died on 1 March 2022, at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Austrian politicians
title: Alfred Mayer (politician)
